description.value:
[Generic][Limited Use] □□

Effect Valais Durant is the leader of the Radiant Oath, in no small part because of her kindness and willingness to share her power with those in need. You may check a box next to this boon and spend an action to use the champion focus spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lay on Hands], heightened appropriately for your level. This does not cost a focus point.
